name: Leave It to Me! (In Effect)
description: The next time you perform "Switch Character": This switch will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> This switch will be considered a $[K2] instead of a $[K1].
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> This switch will be considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> instead of a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>.
